title: School of Medicine
author: Mark Couch; August
cleaned_text: Ihab Kamel, MD, PhD, professor of radiology and oncology at Johns Hopkins School of Medicine, has been named the next chair of the [Department of Radiology](https://medschool.cuanschutz.edu/radiology) at the [University of Colorado School of Medicine](https://medschool.cuanschutz.edu/), effective Sept. 5, 2023. A new study led by researchers from the University of Colorado School of Medicine finds that patients, when given the option to use evidence-based medical weight management tools in a primary care setting, achieve better weight loss results compared to those who receive routine care.
